title: Sci Fi Title Screen Music Volume 2
description: WAS $24.99 NOW ONLY $15.00 ! Sci Fi Title Screen Music Volume 2 Presents 10 background music loops ready for your gaming productions!
longDescription:
WELCOME TO SCI FI TITLE SCREEN MUSIC VOLUME 2 !

This brand new series of 10 title screen tracks is made with the latest and most high quality sounds from around the world! Dive in today and take a listen to what Sci Fi Title Screen Music Volume 2 can offer you!

-

Short Overview:

Sci Fi Title Screen Music Volume 2 Presents 10 background music loops ready for your gaming productions! Over 30 minutes of audio provided with various styles & themes composed, to create tension & atmosphere for your Unreal Project.

-

Percussion Features:

All Percussion in this asset pack was recorded (sampled ) at Skywalker Sound Studio in California.

-

What can the music be used for?

( All of the following tracks are great for title screen style music, loading screens, character customization & menu listings ) edit the music however you like to best fit your game.

-

Track Listing

-

  1. DragonShip
  2. Loading Zone
  3. Galaxy 2.0
  4. Back In Time
  5. Time
  6. Sector 307
  7. Ammo Cell
  8. Shadows Fall
  9. Impact
  10. Falling To Ashes


LISTEN HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-title-screen-music-volume-2/s-frBk3cGOAJr
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Tracks
  •  High quality instrumentation
  •  Various Styles & Themes
  • Mixed & Mastered
  • Not Available in (MP3) Unreal Engine Store Asset ONLY ( No other File Format download other than what is provided by the Unreal Store. ( See Audio Specs below )

 -

Audio Format: WAV

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz | 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 31 minutes 52 Seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

-
